options.label: Reconnected
options.resolution: Conducted visual inspection of dispenser; reconnected breakaway coupling and performed pressure/leak test—no leaks detected during testing.

options.label: Cleaned
options.resolution: Removed leaking dump valve from unit, disassembled and cleaned hard water scale from cappuccino valve; tested and confirmed proper operation.

options.label: Replaced
options.resolution: Removed and replaced cappuccino valve; tested and confirmed proper operation.

options.label: Reset
options.resolution: Inspected valve for any damage, reset the activated fire valve within the dispenser, and conducted leak and functional tests to ensure reliable operation.

options.label: Cracked (R&R)
options.resolution: Replaced cracked, damaged hose, applied sealer to connections, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Leaking (R&R)
options.resolution: Replaced leaking hose, applied sealer to connections, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Leaking (Reseal)
options.resolution: Removed leaking hose, sealed affected connections, reinstalled, and tested thoroughly; all joints remained leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Cracked (R&R)
options.resolution: Replaced cracked, damaged whip, applied sealer to connections, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Leaking (R&R)
options.resolution: Replaced leaking whip, applied sealer to connections, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Leaking (Reseal)
options.resolution: Removed leaking whip, sealed affected connections, reinstalled, and tested thoroughly; all joints remained leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Loose (R&R)
options.resolution: Replaced leaking swivel, applied sealer to connections, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Resealed
options.resolution: Removed leaking swivel, applied sealer to connections, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Spring (R&R)
options.resolution: Failed nozzle hold open clip spring. Replaced damaged nozzle, applied sealer to connection, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Flo-Stop (R&R)
options.resolution: Failed nozzle Flo-Stop device. Replaced damaged nozzle, applied sealer to connection, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Resealed
options.resolution: Removed leaking nozzle, applied sealer to connections, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Leaking
options.resolution: Replaced leaking breakaway, applied sealer to connection, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Doesn't Reconnect
options.resolution: Replaced damaged breakaway - would not reconnect, applied sealer to connection, and tested thoroughly; all joints remain leak-free under pressure.

options.label: Cleared
options.resolution: Cleared fountain drain lines using compressed air to remove blockages; followed by flushing with hot water to ensure full drainage and verify unobstructed flow.

options.label: Stained
options.resolution: Removed stained ceiling tile; cut replacement tile to proper dimensions and installed securely in ceiling grid.

options.label: Broken
options.resolution: Removed broken ceiling tile; cut replacement tile to proper dimensions and installed securely in ceiling grid.

options.label: Missing
options.resolution: Measured and cut ceiling tiles to appropriate dimensions; installed in areas where tiles were missing to restore full ceiling coverage.

options.label: PM
options.resolution: Replaced fuel filters as part of scheduled preventive maintenance; conducted pressure test to confirm all connections remained leak-free.

options.label: Slow Flow
options.resolution: Verified slow flow condition via site server diagnostics; replaced fuel filters on affected dispenser and performed pressure test—no leaks observed.

options.label: no
options.resolution: Performed leak test on dispenser; no leaks detected during inspection. Placed back into service.
